item.description:
Ever wanted to try fresh goat's milk? The Herb Hill Micro-Dairy is a small goat milk dairy in suburban Andover. It specializes in fresh, chilled raw goat's milk. In addition, we they are certified producers of organic herbs, eggs, and have an organic herb and meat chicken CSA through the year. Owner Lucy McKain is the Middlesex County 4-H Dairy Goat Club leader for youth interested in learning about goats.

Come and enjoy a walking tour of the farm at 11:30am. Lucy will demonstrate and describe how goats are milked so that you can try your hand at milking a goat after the demonstration. Watch the chicks, ducks and goat kids at play. Try some moisturizing goat's milk soap and/or bring your own container for filling with organic compost to bring back to your soils for your own growing needs. Items are available for purchase..

The farm visit is FREE!!!!!!!! Raw Milk Dairy Day is sponsored by NOFA/Mass.

 

For more information on Massachusetts RAW MILK DAIRY DAY and the benefits of Raw Milk, check out http://www.nofamass.org/programs/organicdai....  Or join the Massachusetts Raw Milk Network on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/#!/marawmilk
item.name: Raw Milk Dairy Day -FIELD TRIP - Goat's Milk
